Text.Name: FightSkillEsoterica_1
Text.Desc: A basic technique learned by cultivators. Involves concentrating Qi in the palm of one's hand, and releasing it toward the target.

Text.Name: FightSkillEsoterica_2
Text.Desc: Harness elemental fire energies that abound throughout the world, and manipulate them to scorch the target.

Text.Name: FightSkillEsoterica_3
Text.Desc: Harness elemental Metal energies that abound throughout the world, and focus them into bolts of Qi to strike at the enemy.

Text.Name: FightSkillEsoterica_4
Text.Desc: Emit an incredibly fast beam of light into the target, devastating their spirit.

Text.Name: FightSkillEsoterica_Gong1_1
Text.Desc: Call upon the power of ancient water healing to restore Qi for all friendly characters.

Text.Name: FightSkillEsoterica_Gong3_1
Text.Desc: Resonate your spirit with that of an Artifact, greatly increasing its power.

Text.Name: FightSkillEsoterica_Gong4_1
Text.Desc: Trigger the power of a Chaos Jade to open a portal to the void, dealing great damage to all enemy targets.

Text.Name: FightSkillEsoterica_Gong4_2
Text.Desc: Enhance Qi Shield effects for all friendly characters.

Text.Name: FightSkillEsoterica_Gong4_3
Text.Desc: Draw upon the restorative energies of the forests to recover your Qi.

Text.Name: FightSkillEsoterica_Gong9_1
Text.Desc: Utilize the transmigration cycles of reincarnation to significantly restore your Qi.
